General.Name: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes electrolytic capacitors. The company offers aluminum electrolytic capacitors, such as e-cap SMD, radial lead type, snap-in and lug terminal type, and screw terminal type capacitors; and aluminum polymer capacitors comprising polymer radial lead type and polymer SMD type capacitors. Taiwan Chinsan Electronic Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Guangfu Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
